questiontext.text:

  2. \[ n(x) = \begin{cases} 9 \, x - 7 & x \leq 0 \\ -2 \, x + 2 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

Determine if each of the following piecewise functions is continuous.

  1. \[ m(x) = \begin{cases} -9 \, x - 2 & x \leq 0 \\ -4 \, x - 2 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

  2. \[ f(x) = \begin{cases} 4 \, x + 1 & x \leq 0 \\ 8 \, x - 8 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

Determine if each of the following piecewise functions is continuous.

  1. \[ g(x) = \begin{cases} -6 \, x + 1 & x \leq 0 \\ 7 \, x + 1 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

  2. \[ h(x) = \begin{cases} 9 \, x - 1 & x \leq 0 \\ -9 \, x + 2 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

  1. \[ f(x) = \begin{cases} -3 \, x - 7 & x \leq 0 \\ x - 7 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

  2. \[ g(x) = \begin{cases} -8 \, x + 9 & x \leq 0 \\ -x - 4 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

  2. \[ n(x) = \begin{cases} 8 \, x + 4 & x \leq 0 \\ x + 6 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]
